issue.title: [Java] Run vector tests for both allocators
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9371](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9371). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As per https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7619#discussion_r451140735 the vector tests should be run for both netty and unsafe allocators

comments.body:
